page.title: 20Domesday - Final Comment.
page.content:
This project has been undertaken by the following people all of whom work and learn at John Mason School in Abingdon - a small group of 3rd year pupils, a 6th former with computer knowledge, a 4th former from a D-block village and several teachers. Everybody concerned have thoroughly enjoyed the project and we are convinced that it has increased our knowledge of the area in which we live.
James Drury Ian Foster Darren Fuller Robert Keeler Nathan Hamilton Colin McBeth Sharon Pearce Graham Legg Neil Whittington Elizabeth Statham Jason Woodley Vivian Wright Lee Tame July 1985
